criteria: Understanding of Consequences of Alcohol Use During Pregnancy
Understanding of Consequences of Tobacco Use During Pregnancy
Understanding of Consequences of Other Drug Use During Pregnancy
Understanding of Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders (FASDs)
descriptions: The student demonstrates no understanding of the consequences of alcohol use during pregnancy.
The student shows a minimal understanding, with significant inaccuracies or omissions regarding the effects of alcohol on the fetus.
The student identifies some consequences but lacks depth or detail in their explanation of the specific effects of alcohol on the developing fetus.
The student accurately describes several consequences of alcohol use during pregnancy, including some effects on fetal development, but may lack comprehensive detail.
The student provides a detailed explanation of the consequences of alcohol use during pregnancy, including specific effects on fetal development and potential long-term health issues.

The student comprehensively explains the consequences of alcohol use during pregnancy, including detailed effects on fetal development, potential long-term health issues, and demonstrates understanding of Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders (FASDs).
The student demonstrates no understanding of the consequences of tobacco use during pregnancy.
The student shows a minimal understanding, with significant inaccuracies or omissions regarding the effects of tobacco on the fetus.
The student identifies some consequences but lacks depth or detail in their explanation of the specific effects of tobacco on the developing fetus.
The student accurately describes several consequences of tobacco use during pregnancy, including some effects on fetal development, but may lack comprehensive detail.
The student provides a detailed explanation of the consequences of tobacco use during pregnancy, including specific effects on fetal development and potential long-term health issues.

The student comprehensively explains the consequences of tobacco use during pregnancy, including detailed effects on fetal development, potential long-term health issues, and potential consequences to the mother.
The student demonstrates no understanding of the consequences of other drug use during pregnancy.

The student accurately describes several consequences of drug use during pregnancy, including some effects on fetal development, but may lack comprehensive detail.
The student provides a detailed explanation of the consequences of drug use during pregnancy, including specific effects on fetal development and potential long-term health issues.

The student comprehensively explains the consequences of drug use during pregnancy, including detailed effects on fetal development, potential long-term health issues, and can cite specific examples of drugs and their effects.
The student demonstrates no understanding of Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders.
The student shows a minimal understanding of FASDs, with significant inaccuracies or omissions regarding the nature and effects of these disorders.
The student identifies FASDs but lacks depth or detail in their explanation of the specific characteristics and impacts of these disorders.

The student provides a detailed explanation of the characteristics, impacts, and range of disorders included in FASDs.

The student comprehensively explains the characteristics, impacts, range of disorders included in FASDs, demonstrates understanding of the causes and prevention strategies, and can discuss the long-term implications for individuals and families.
